name: UIDragAnimating
desc: The interface for providing custom animation alongside the system's lift, drop, and cancellation animations.

items.name: func addAnimations(() -> Void)
items.desc: Adds an animation block for modifying a view animation while it is running.

items.name: func addCompletion((UIViewAnimatingPosition) -> Void)
items.desc: Adds an animation completion block to run when a view animation has ended.
